description: This Dart file defines the main 'HomeScreen' widget for a Flutter app, with role-based UI components and navigation to different administrative, managerial, and delivery screens. It contains widget classes, role selection logic, and UI layout for a multi-role health meal ordering platform.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget class for the role-based home screen with navigation and layout.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the role selection, UI layout, and navigation logic for HomeScreen.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: A small widget for displaying a label with an icon, used in role content panels.

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Builds a dropdown button for selecting user roles (Admin, Manager, Delivery).

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Builds clickable pills for quick role switching, with visual feedback.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Returns a string title based on the selected role.

methods.name: _buildRoleContent
methods.description: Renders different role-specific UI panels with navigation buttons.
